summary: A final composition class that aggregates all individual classification grammars to process full sentences with punctuation, handling case sensitivity and deterministic or nondeterministic transductions, and supports compilation into an OpenFst FAR file for deployment.
business_intent: Enable end‑to‑end text normalization and classification in speech or language applications, providing a ready‑to‑deploy finite‑state model that can be cached or rebuilt as needed.
